title: Strengthening Clinical Practice Competencies: Capacity Building for Internationalized Blended and Virtual Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply motivation strategies based on Self-Determination Theory (SDT) to internationalized virtual/blended learning environments.
Learners can design language learning projects for multicultural teams by utilizing Active Learning principles.
Learners can develop and operate effective blended learning modules in limited technological environments (primarily smartphone-based).
Learners can utilize tools to measure growth in learner engagement, cultural sensitivity, and language proficiency through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
